page.title: 07BRANDON HALL HOTEL,COVENTRY.
page.content: Until{1946}the ruins of the old Manor House could still be seen but over the years they have been cleared away. {Trust House Forte}bought the hotel in 1973 and the details which follow show what facilities the hotel offers. The{restaurant}food is of a very high standard .The head chef has worked for T.H.F.for over 10 years.A recipe book written by him lists 23 awards he has won since 1979.These are for a variety of dishes but his particular flair is for cold buffets and traditional English dishes. The table wine menu offers a choice of 17 different wines. Other amenities include a games room with a pool table, darts and table tennis.There are squash courts, a mini golf course, giant chess set and a children's playground in the grounds. Conference facilities are available.
